item.title: X Could not find Module `Prelude` fix
item.description: Today I was experimenting with Haskell and this error struck me: X Could not find Module Prelude There are files missing in the base-x-x-x package, This has an easy fix: Install the ghc-static package sudo pacman -S ghc-static Then all should compile easily.
